In addition to any powers set forth elsewhere, the Board may:
consult with engineering authorities and organizations concerned with standard safety codes about:
regulations governing the operation, maintenance, servicing, construction, alteration, installation, and inspection of elevator units; and
qualifications that are adequate, reasonable, and necessary for elevator mechanics and elevator contractors;
recommend applicable legislation;
adopt bylaws for the conduct of its proceedings; and
adopt regulations to carry out Part III of this subtitle.
